definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依舊想在iPad內容聚合器上看到更多的創新。

sentences.english: While traditional hot-spot issues remain unresolved, new conflicts break out from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 傳統熱點依舊，新的衝突時有發生。

sentences.english: This is a preview, not the V1 release.
sentences.chinese: 這依舊是一個預覽版，並非V1版。

sentences.english: I will not be stubborn, still can deal with time.
sentences.chinese: 不會再固執的我，依舊對時間沒轍。

sentences.english: The vine still clings to the moldering wall.
sentences.chinese: 藤蘿依舊纏繞坍塌的牆垣。

sentences.english: I heard a girl singing My Heart Will Go On when I passed the Music Hall.
sentences.chinese: 我經過音樂廳的時候聽到有個女孩唱《我心依舊》。

sentences.english: The momentum to improve health outcomes has persevered.
sentences.chinese: 改善健康結果的勢頭也依舊不減。

sentences.english: The moonlight is still quiet, only a dim.
sentences.chinese: 月光依舊是清幽，只是多了一抹黯淡。

sentences.english: Alucard: Mankind continues to fight, but it is a desperate fight to stay alive.
sentences.chinese: 人類依舊爭鬥不止，其生命本身便是一場絕望的戰鬥。

sentences.english: I still is that single-wing butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 我依舊是那隻單翼蝴蝶。

sentences.english: I still stand alley, lonely wait.
sentences.chinese: 我依舊站在巷口，孤獨地等待。

sentences.english: You are the reason why I became stronger. But still, you are my weakness.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你，我學會了牛勁，而你，依舊是我的傷。

sentences.english: And the Chanaanite began to dwell with them.
sentences.chinese: 客納罕人依舊住在這些地方。

sentences.english: I can still move my upper body.
sentences.chinese: 我的上半身依舊活動自如。

sentences.english: Every day the sun still withdraw into my room, I was any more from you.
sentences.chinese: 每天的陽光依舊撒進我的房間，我就離你越近一步。

sentences.english: Persist to work hard in her the dream that that freedom write as of oldly.
sentences.chinese: 依舊的在她的那自由撰稿的夢裏執着着打拼着呀。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
in the end/after all is said and done
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
